Name: Bajan Daiquiri
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
1 barspoon Powdered sugar (white sugar ground in mortar and pestle) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A full-flavoured Daiquiri with a delicate touch of clove.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly in London, England.
